OnlyInsideServer: You can only run this command inside a server.
AlreadyConfigured: Auto role has already been configured for that role. To disable run '/autorole disable'
Configured: Autorole has now been configured. To disable run '/autorole disable'
NotConfigured: Auto role has not been configured for this server. Use '/autorole configure' to set it up.
Disabled: Auto role has been disabled for this server. Use '/autorole configure' to set it up again.
